meanings.definition: A small shrub with fragrant white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful mezereons blooming in the spring.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of mezereons to decorate the table.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the mezereons, enjoying the sweet nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as lovely as a cluster of mezereons in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate scent of mezereons lingered in the air, enchanting all who passed by.

meanings.definition: The dried bark of the mezereon shrub, used in medicine.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist prepared a healing potion using dried mezereons.
meanings.sent2: The medicine contained a hint of mezereons, giving it a unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: The villagers believed that mezereons had magical healing properties.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of herbs was as deep as the roots of the mezereons.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of mezereons filled the room, bringing comfort to the sick.

meanings.definition: A poisonous plant of the genus Daphne.
meanings.sent1: Beware of the bright red berries of the mezereons, for they are toxic.
meanings.sent2: The forest ranger warned hikers to stay away from the dangerous mezereons.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel dared his friend to eat a mezereon berry.
meanings.sent4: The mezereons stood like silent sentinels, guarding their deadly secret.
meanings.sent5: The ominous shadow of the mezereons cast a foreboding presence in the moonlight.
